pr_title: [RW-4825][risk = no] prerequisites for egress alert enhancements

timeline.bodyText: Arguably I could split this one out, since it's not needed here, but for simplicity I went one class or file at a time.
timeline.author: jaycarlton

replies.bodyText: Please delete the original ProfileController.updateBypass() because it will be very confusing to have both, even for a short time.
replies.author: jmthibault79

timeline.bodyText: I'd build this into a mapper, but it's slated to be removed soon.
timeline.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: We should probably make a separate ProfileService interface and make this a ProfileServiceImpl.
timeline.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: All this updateXForUser should be unchanged from what it was in the ProfileController.
timeline.author: jaycarlton

replies.bodyText: same goes for the others in this file
replies.author: jmthibault79

timeline.bodyText: The rename here is because I felt like "federated" wan't really an abstraction, but a function of where the information is fetched from, which is an implementation detail.
timeline.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: @als364 Some things have moved from here.
timeline.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: one could argue that the WorkspaceAdminController should depend on the ActionAuditQueryService directly instead of putting getAuditLogEntries() here.
timeline.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: I killed these two, because it boiled down to m = mock(); assert(m); after the method moved.
timeline.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: please rm the original ProfileController.FROM_CLIENT_INSTITUTIONAL_AFFILIATION and copy over its comment

timeline.bodyText: So this couldn't be a new userMapper.toWorkspaceUserAdminView(userRole) ?
timeline.author: jmthibault79

replies.bodyText: It didn't feel like a win. I don't like adding incomplete mapping methods to the mappers. This was an odd case where we try to return partial information on an invalid user, and I want the mapper to operate on valid users only more or less.
replies.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: nit: could use Guava not() here
timeline.author: jmthibault79

replies.bodyText:
Guava for the most part isn't needed for streams anymore I think.

New hotness is
            pageToken =
                Optional.ofNullable(resp.getNextPageToken())
                    .filter(((Predicate<String>) String::isEmpty).negate());
replies.author: jaycarlton
